name: Golf War
description:
After a perilous, multi-year sojourn through the martial arts dojos of Japan, you return to your homeland of Scotland. That's when you find out your best mate signed you up for Golf War: the tournament of kings that determines who wears the crown of the kingdom!

So get your ninja jammies on, blacken your clubs, and hit the links... and some knuckleheads... in this side-scrolling golf brawling battle for royal glory!
